titleStmt.title: The famous and notable sayings of an eminent holder-forth near Covent-Garden. Published for the benefit of his friends in the counties of Wilts, Oxford, Somerset, Southampton, Gloucester, Berks, and Middlesex. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Lightfoot near Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
